definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: In a lot of practical problems, one often encounters the extreme problem of continuous functions.
sentences.chinese: 在很多實際問題中，會遇到求連續函數的極值問題。

sentences.english: The improved RCGA was employed to solve the problems of continuing function optimization.
sentences.chinese: 並將該算法應用於連續函數優化求解。

sentences.english: Furthermore, it is assume that the demigrated wavefield is a continuous function of the velocity.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還假設偏移場是速度的連續函數。

sentences.english: Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algorithm is a powerful method to find the extremum of a continuous numerical function.
sentences.chinese: 微粒羣優化算法是求解連續函數極值的一個有效方法。
